LanguageData.Shell_LingGas_ToxicBuildup.label: Poisonous fog shells
LanguageData.Shell_LingGas_ToxicBuildup.description: A bomb carrying a highly concentrated poison that can create a large cloud of poison when triggered, poisoning any high-speed creature within range.
LanguageData.Bullet_LingGas_ToxicBuildup.label: Poisonous fog shells
LanguageData.LingGas_ToxicBuildup.label: Concentrated poisonous smoke
LanguageData.LingTrapIED_HighStun.label: Electrostatic bombs
LanguageData.LingTrapIED_HighStun.description: A deployment bomb that emits electrostatic waves that can temporarily disable creatures within range and disable appliances.
LanguageData.LingTrapIED_Toxic.label: Poison fog bomb
LanguageData.LingTrapIED_Toxic.description: A bomb carrying a highly concentrated poison can create a large cloud of poison after triggering, poisoning any high-speed creature within range.
